resources.string: Use filler text that has been edited for length an format to match on a the characteristics of real content as closely as possible.
Use filler text where helps your design process, but use real content if you’ve got it as long as it does distract and slow down your design process.
Design is an evolutionary process, and filler text is just one tool in your progress-pushing arsenal.
